author: AP
title: Heat's Dragic says he's not going to Slovenia during layoff
description: Goran Dragic of the Miami Heat says he is prepared to forgo his annual offseason move back to his native Slovenia if that is what the NBA schedule necessitates
content:
MIAMI (AP) — Goran Dragic of the Miami Heat said Tuesday that he is prepared to forgo his annual offseason move back to his native Slovenia if that is what the NBA schedule necessitates.
Dragic, his wife and their two children are in Miami and have no plans … [+2188 chars]
